Entries.default: "And so, robbed of your castle, torn from your body, your soul wakes to a sleepless world, the In-Between of life and death."
"Fragments of memories stretch out before you, leading you on."
"Yes, you are a Watcher. Not born, but made."
"In life, you spoke to souls wandering the In-Between. Lost souls, like you are now."
"Your castle, Caed Nua. And your steward, preserved in white adra."
"Thaos, an immortal agent of the gods. He set a crisis in motion. And you stopped him."
"Iovara, an ancient apostate, punished for discovering the truth."
"He had guarded the gods' secrets for millennia."
"In the end, you left them both behind and returned to the world of mortals. Until now."
